description:
After Sousuke causes a lunchtime riot, he and Kaname must man the bread counter and serve the students. Meanwhile, a mad dash ensues when Sagara forgets to bring Kaname’s study notes to school.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hostilidade Passageira! - Um Almoço Sem Resultados!
Surechigai no Hostility / Karamawari no Lunchtime
Une hostilité passagère / Une pause déjeuner mouvementée
すれ違いのホスティリティ / 空回りのランチタイム
